description:
DM Scotty shows you how to make huts for your miniature table top games.

Follow DM Scotty's Facebook group for DM's Craft updates and info: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/
Visit the DM's Craft Forum to meet other crafters, see cool pics of crafted stuff and pick up great tips and tricks: http://dmscraft.proboards.com/ A special thanks to Mad Lad Designs, AJ and DMG for helping to moderate The DM's Craft forum. Another thank you to Earlteagrey for the new DM's Craft intro.

Music: "Epic Battle And War Music," under royalty free license from Footage Firm Inc. 

Also vist TheDMGinfo channel for more great 2.5D projects and ideas: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJLqz6kcB1gMPiVnL0XfUDg
title: How to Craft HUT Terrain for Table Top Games (The DM's Craft #105 Part1)
